1.content:
Mikayla, the baby mermaid: What if after Aerosol, the orange mermaid from the episode "A Mermaid's Tail", changed Mikayla into a mermaid, she uses her siren song to hypnotized Mikayla into acting like a baby mermaid?

Brady's new recipe: Brady tries to cook something for Mikayla to impress her and uses the cookbook Lenny gave him and tells him that the food cooked from it has magical properties in it. After Brady cooks a cake that is supposed to make the person who eats fall love in love with the person who eats and gives it to Mikayla, instead of making Mikayla falling in love, it mentally regresses her instead.

King babysitters: After Mason left Boomer and Brady in charge of the castle, they accidentally find the treasure room and Brady finds a necklace that makes the person that wears into what they dream of being. Brady gives it to Mikayla and it turns her into a baby! Now Brady and Boomer have to take care of her and change her back before Mason comes back.

Which story would you like to do?
1.title: What story would you like to do?

choices: Aerosol takes back her new baby mermaid to the castle
Brady comes in and takes Mikayla away from them
Aerosol turns Mikayla back into a human
11.content:
Taking place after Mikayla thinks she got the mermaids out of the castle, Aerosol gave her starfish necklace to Mikayla uses it to turn her into a mermaid.

"What did you do to me!?"

"Don't worry honey, you won't be that way forever if you give me my necklace back!"

Aerosol said with a evil smile in her knowing her plan is working.

"Fine here."

Mikayla gives back the necklace to Aerosol and puts it back on her neck

"Now, change me back, please!"

"Oh don't worry my little baby!"

Aerosol uses the necklace's hypnotic power on Mikayla and got her into a trace

"From now on, you will think you are a baby mermaid and won't be turned back until I say otherwise!"

Mikayla snapped out of the trance and started to suck on her thumb, her mind has been regressed to become a baby's.

What happens next?
11.title: Mikayla, the baby mermaid

113.content: Wanna keep going with this story?
113.title: Going alternate

1132.content:
What if she was forced into diapers?
If yes... How?
1132.title: No

choices: Yes and she wants more of it.
No but, she starts to feel werid.
12.content:
Brady is in the kitchen trying to make something for Mikayla to impress her but, he keeps failing at making anything.

"Oh man, how am I gonna impress Mikayla if I can't even make a cookie!"

All of a sudden, Lenny comes in with a fire hose and starts spraying everything.

"Oh my highness, I did not see there!"

"It's okay cuz. Hey, do you any recipe that is easy to bake or cook?"

"Well, I do have this cookbook but, I don't think you want it."

"How come?"

"Well....it has some, side effects in it"

"What kind?"

"Permanent. Of course, I know you wouldn't want it-"

"Give it to me! I mean.......yeah that's what I mean"

"Okay but, you have to give me your key to the room on the 3rd floor!"

"Huh, oh the key to vault. Sure."

Lenny gave the cookbook to Brady in exchange to his key, in which Lenny ran off with happily.

"I don't get why he wants to go to the room with all the records and stuff. Now let's read the "Exchanted Cookbook For Dummies. The cookbook that makes anything happens for a purpose.' Nice title"

Brady found a recipe in which makes the person feel younger and decided that would be perfect for Mikayla. He started making and finished it with perfection.

"Okay, it says to cook it by the hour of how many years you want. Hmm, eh, let's make it a hour so this could be done faster."

Brady put the cake into the oven and set it for a hour, little did he know that, he just made a cake that would regress Mikayla's mind into a one-year old's. Later he took it out and it looked good.

"Awesome. Now, I have to decorate it and give it to Mikayla"

Brady decorate the cake and went to Mikayla who was in the watchtower.

"Hey there cutie!"

"Call me that again and I will slice your head off!"

"Hey chill out, I just want to give you this cake I made!'

"You made this?"

"Yeah, and don't worry. I made sure I read all of the directions this time."

"Okay then, I guess I will have a slice."

Mikayla took out a slice of the cake and ate it. Does the cake affect her now?
12.title: Brady's new recipe

choices: Her mind was beginning to regress.
121.content:
She wanted more of it.
After several more pieces, she started feeling strange. What was happening?
121.title: Yes and she wants more of it.

choices: Did not notice the wet spot
1211.content:
"Brady, I'm feeling weird..."

"How weird? Weird enough to love me?"

"No, it's something else...can you take me to the couch? I need to lay down for awhile..."

"Oh I get it, you, me, the couch...I know where this is going."

"Not now Brady! Just... take me downstairs, now!"

Brady took Mikayla to couch where she fell asleep as soon she got there. Brady decided to let her sleep and went to play around with Boomer. When he comes back, he saw a wet puddle was forming around Mikayla.

"Um...Mikayla, wake up! Your...wetting yourself."

Mikayla woke up and.....
1211.title: Her mind was beginning to regress.

12111.content:
"Wha?"
She didn't notice.

Her regression was happing slowly.

He cleaned her up.
"If anything else happens let me know."
"Right."
He checked on her later, and found that she...
12111.title: Did not notice the wet spot

13.content:
The Kings had nothing to do. Which was weird because, Mason left for a reunion and Mikayla was in charge but, that means even more no fun for them.

"Man, what are we gonna do now?"

"I don't know Brady but, I know we are NOT gonna stay in our rooms while Mason is gone!"

"Yeah but you know Mikayla."

"Yeah If only there was some way we could be in charge of her, then we would have a ton of fun"

"Yeah! Like, make her our maid and dress her up in those Maid Outfits!"

"Yeah but, if only we know how."

"Hey, what about that treasure room we keep hearing from them?"

"What about it?"

"If we could find something to bribe Mikayal with in there, maybe we could be in charge!"

"That's an awesome idea Brady but, how are we gonna get out of our rooms when she is watching us?"

Just then, Mikayla came in to their room telling them that something came up and she have to go for a while.

"Remember, DON'T leave this room!"

When they heard Mikayla left with the rest of the guards, the two ran down to the throne room and started searching for it.

"Where could it be?"

"Maybe it's behind the shelf of our family's jewels!"

Brady looked around and found a hidden keypad next to the shelf.

"Okay, whats the password?"

"1234?"

"Let's try it."

Brady pushed in the code and the shelf soon opened up, revealing the hidden treasure room. The two soon found a beautiful necklace that was perfect.

'Wait there's something here! It says "Whoever wears this shall have their dream come true?"

"No time Boomer, she's coming RIGHT NOW!"

The two ran our of the treasure and closed the door, and just sat in the couch when Mikayla came in.

"I thought I told you to stay in your room!"

"Well, we were hungry and came down to get something to eat!"

"Whatever, just go back upstairs!"

"Wait, we would like to give you something, as a gift for taking care of us."

Brady gave Mikayal the necklace which Mikayla was surprised and happy at the Kings, she put it on and thank the Kings.

"Wow, thanks. Where you get it?"

"The treasure room!"

"The treasure room? Please don't tell me it's the one hidden behind the shelf!"

"That's the one!"

"The stuff is cursed! It can change your appearance or, make you think your a monkey!"

"Ooh! We should find the monkey thing and give it to Mason!"

"Yeah we should! Hey where's Mikayla!"

"Right here!"

The Kings looked down and saw Mikayla as a..................
13.title: King babysitters

choices: Got Mikayla dressed like a baby.
133.content:
She suddenly became a 1-year-old! Luckily she still had her same mind but, she was furious

"What'd you do to me?"

"Um, sorry."

"Sorry's not good enough. Now you've got to put this thing back where you found it and get me back to normal, and take care of me too."

"Another fine mess you've gotten us into.", Boomer told Brady, punching him in the arm.

First things first, they...
133.title: Your  Choice

info.brief_description: What if Mikayla from 'Pair of Kings' was regressed to wear diapers?
info.description:
Mikayla from the Disney(XD) show 'Pairs of Kings' has been forced to regression to wears. How does this happen? Who did this to her? And how does Brady react to his love of his life has been regressed?

Well, we don't need to hurry and find out cause YOU will be deciding how the story will take place and how the characters react! So, enjoy this fun and exciting regression story! :)


Note: Any regression is allowed but, Mental regression is preferred. Also, please don't add another way of regression into a formatted regression story already. For example: If the story is about Mental Regression, don't add Physical regression on to it, I would like it if you stick to the regression being used.
